sense.gloss: to disdain, to look down on, to make light of, to hold in contempt, to scorn, to despise

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑忠告↑↓ちゅうこく↓を↑侮↑↓|あなど↓る|な。
sdata.e: Don't make light of his advice.

sdata.j: ↑虫歯↑↓むしば↓を↑侮↑↓|あなど↓る|と↑命↑↓いのち↓に↑係↑↓かか↓わる↑場合↑↓ばあい↓もあるのです。
sdata.e: Making light of cavities can be a matter of life and death.
